channel.title: Capgras Mag
channel.description: A Literary Journal of Undiagnosable Writing

item.title: Capgras Volume Two
item.description: with works from Milo Christie, Alex Tretbar, Ann Pedone, Kirtana Hariharan, Tony DiCarlo, Tahjia Brantley, Mauricio Moon, TR Brady, Haoran Hu, Emmett Lewis

item.title: Capgras Volume One
item.description: with works from Robert Fernandez, PJ Lombardo, Frances Revel Eckensberger, RM Haines, Patty Nash, Evan Williams, Eliza Guerra, Evelynn Black, Peter Myers, Kai Ihns
